name: Pleasant Pergola
description:
Some of the beams in this pergola may be built slightly askew, but the vines don't seem to care, as they gently climb up the pillars, and reach out their tendrils to greet passersby. Those weathered benches provide an inviting place to sit and enjoy this semi-shaded walkway. Taken at Montréal Botanical Garden in June 2008, these vines have no doubt grown to fully cover the structure by now.

#6 in the "Inviting You Through" series, a collection of windows, archways, and covered passages, which will invite you to look or travel through them, to see what's on the other side, or simply enjoy the journey of getting there.
